pages.text: The Ritual of Serenity creates a zone of peace where hostile creatures cannot spawn. Perfect for protecting your base without relying on torches or other lighting.

pages.title: Costs
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 10,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Upkeep:$() 50 LP per tick (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 48 blocks (configurable)$(br2)Hostile mob spawning is completely prevented within the ritual's spherical range.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: $(bold)Existing Mobs:$() Does not remove mobs that are already present - only prevents new spawns.$(br2)$(bold)Stacking:$() Multiple rituals can overlap to cover larger areas.$(br2)$(italic)In blood there is peace.$()
